description.en: In this urban land we live in, humans with supernatural powers have always been the talk of the town. Among the most debated forces are the ancient martial artists, psychics, and cultivators. These people are regarded as the talents from heaven, the proud sons from above… With their super abilities, they stand out among the mortals and many of them became successful businessmen. However, with great power comes great greed. The three forces have always engaged in fights for power—to be the cream of the crop, while the banishment of dragon deity, Ye Zun, from heaven to the mortal realm had further stirred the peace among the three forces. What commences could be an inevitable world war...
description.zh: 现代都市，在芸芸众生之中存在着具有特殊能力的人，当中以古武者，异能者，和修仙者为三大巨头。这些人天纵奇才，是天之骄子，他们凭借异于常人的能力在自己的领域出类拔萃，占领巅峰，当中不少人混迹商海，成为商业大鳄。然而，能力越强，野心也就越大，三大势力无时无刻不酝酿着第一之争。随着蛊龙仙尊叶尊渡劫失败，空降人间，水底的暗流被打破，一场波澜壮阔的大战即将开幕。
